div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 132 Talanta, near Monemvasia, Laconia, 1948 or earlier Burial: early 3rd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 31 AR Alexander III: 1 dr. Lysimachus: 1 dr. (Colophon) Boeotia: 1 dr. Athens: 1 tetradr. Aegina: 1 dr. Sicyon: 1 triob. Disposition: Athens 6 as listed; priv. coll., Athens, some Varoucha, BCH 1949, p. 520
